articles.description: Dame Laura Kenny, Britain's most successful female Olympian, announces her retirement from cycling.
articles.title: Laura Kenny: Britain's most successful female Olympian retires from cycling

articles.description: Born in Nigeria. Bred in Glasgow. Bound for the NFL? Praise Olatoke has swapped the running track for the gridiron field as he looks to fly the flag for Scotland stateside.
articles.title: NFL: Praise Olatoke aiming for American football stardom

articles.description: There is life in Erik ten Hag yet as Manchester United manager, writes Phil McNulty, after their dramatic FA Cup quarter-final win over Liverpool.
articles.title: 'There is life in Ten Hag yet as Man Utd manager'

articles.description: An injured Scottie Scheffler overcomes a five-shot deficit in the final round to become the first player to defend the Players Championship at TPC Sawgrass.
articles.title: Players Championship: Scottie Scheffler first to defend title with win at Sawgrass

articles.description: Dame Laura Kenny, Britain's most successful female Olympian, tells BBC Breakfast "it is the right decision" to retire from cycling.
articles.title: It is the right decision to retire - Kenny

articles.description: Caragh McMurtry spent five years taking debilitating medication for a condition she didn't have. Now, the former Great Britain rower is fighting to ensure no-one has to suffer in the same way.
articles.title: Caragh McMurtry: Great Britain rower's neurodiversity journey

articles.description: World number two Carlos Alcaraz defends his Indian Wells title with a straight-set win over Daniil Medvedev in a repeat of last year's final.
articles.title: Indian Wells: Carlos Alcaraz beats Daniil Medvedev to defend title

articles.description: Trabzonspor fans ran on to the field and attacked Fenerbahce players after Sunday's Super Lig match.
articles.title: Trabzonspor fans attack Fenerbahce players after loss

articles.description: Who is like LeBron James, who is the "find of the tournament" and who still delivers pizza? Meet the new Six Nations stars.
articles.title: Six Nations breakthrough stars: Who stood out?
